images.copyright: Two Bactrian camels in Kazakhstan for Twosday (© Nurlan Kulcha/Alamy)
images.title: Two for Twosday
images.caption: Twosday
images.desc: Is this pair of dual-humped Bactrian camels heralding hump day? Nope, it's not quite Wednesday yet—but you can double down on your celebratory mood this February 22, because Tuesday, 2/22/22 occurs just once every 400 years. So on this deuce of a day, beware of two-timers claiming they'll pay you back next Twosday—you'll be short your two bits until February 22, 2422.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
